full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS AA RA PA TZA NA LA BRTEN PA'I SHES RAB BLO 'PHEL GYI CHO GA SHIN TU ZAB PA BLO GROS MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS AA RA PA TZA NA LA RTEN PA'I SHES RAB BLO 'PHEL GYI CHO GA SHIN TU ZAB MO BLO GROS MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG LUGS KUN LA BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS SHING, RTZE GCIG SGRUB LA BTZAN PA SOGS BSNGAGS 'OS KYI YON TAN DU MAS PHYUG PA DGE BSHES BYAMS PA BLO GROS NAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BRI DGOS ZHES GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, STAG PHU GONG MA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I MTSAN GYIS BYIN GYIS RLABS PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG 'DU SHES GSUM PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG TU 'BOD PA'I GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS, BSAM GTAN GYI BSTI GNAS DGE 'PHEL BYANG CHUB GLING DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MAS RJES SU BZUNG STE MYUR DU SMON CING GROL BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
